attributes.action: Restore freedom of choice for pubs, clubs and private clubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is currently taking away the freedom of choice for landlords by introducing a blanket ban on smoking in public places, this is unacceptable for a democracy. 

Landlords should be given the choice of introducing well ventilated smoking rooms on their property.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
